reviews.review:
Why aren't games like this nowadays? Absolutly fantabulous, having someone aid you in combat is magnificent, and overall...One hell of an adventure. Only thing i really didnt like is the fact that you can only carry two weapons, compared to Bioshock 1 and 2, where every weapon was on you all at once. 

9.5/10, buy this fucking game before steam summer sale goes away for another year.

Jó game, bár a történet vége meglepett, érdekes játék volt, ami nálam csúcstartó ebben ajátékban, az hogy soha  büdös életben nem haltam meg ennyiszer Medium modban xD buggok voltak benne, annyira nem súlyosak és nem is sok, de tetszett :D voltak a játékban könnyebb-nehezebb küldetések, effektek nagyon tetszettek max grafikán :D kb enyi. :D
Enorme
Best game i have ever played. 10/10 would play again.

BioShock Infinite is worth playing, but it is not without its flaws. Infinite is a competent shooter with alright gunplay enhanced by the ability to use "magic" abilities to best your foes. Overall play is clean and fast, though the "rinse and repeat" nature of the gameplay will become clear very quickly. If you liked the gameplay in BioShock 1 and 2, you can expect more of the same here.

The gameplay offers nothing new or world-changing. BioShock 1 and 2 have most of the combat elements down pat and there is a very cool "rail" feature whereby the player character can zip along suspended rails throughout the game's floating city. It is a really fun mechanic, though if you've played Metroid Prime 3, you will find this mechanic lacking.

Looking at the whole product, the story seems to be what the developers wanted the main focus to be. And this puts the game back on its heels, in my opinion. The story is alright but it's standard fare for time-travel/dimensional travel stories and rapidly begins to wobble under the weight of its many convoluted (and sometimes poorly explained) threads.

Overall I can recommend this game to fans of BioShock and fans of First Person Shooters. If you're looking for a non-linear experience that rewards the player for exploration, look elsewhere. This game exemplifies the qualities of many modern first person shooters, which is neither good or bad. It simply is, and if you like those types of mechanics you're going to love BioShock Infinite.

Игра представляет собой коридорные уровни где вы убиваете, от силы, 10 разновидностей врагов в различных комбинациях. Сюжет совершенно натянут и без каких либо неожиданных поворотов. Вся эта красочность и ретровость приедается уже через пол часа игры. Видимо Borderlands - это максимум, на что способен разработчик. 
 Совершенно не понимаю форсирование этой игры и восхваление.

É um excelente jogo, gráficos muito bonitos, jogabilidade que dá pra pegar sem dificuldades. O Enredo é super bem bolado, e apesar de não ser o meu jogo favorito da série, vale a pena jogar. Acho que o unico ponto negativo aqui, em minha opinião, é que Bioshock perdeu um pouco do clima sinistro que o confinamento em Rapture proporcionava. Os ambientes apertados e claustorfobicos de BioShock 1 e 2 foram marcantes. Columbia é um ambiente aberto, vc vai jogar ao ar livre muitas vezes. Só tem medo que não gosta de altura. Mas fora isso é maravilhoso, super recomendado!
Juegazo donde lo haya, historia, jugabilidad, música, detalles.

I found this game through Cryaotic's youtube channel and fell in love with it in an instant. It's likely one of the most visually stunning games I've had the chance to play and it's certainly not its only forte. The plot is, in my humble opinion, exceptionally well written and how much you relate with the characters makes this a very emotionally involving gaming experience. I bought the game and both its prequels without a second thought, knowing it's definitely worth the money.
I found the gameplay quite adaptable and smooth. Controls are fairly easy and the instructions throughout the game were helpful and done in a less-annoying way. My only complaint with the controls was the speed of which the camera moved. At times it felt somewhat dizzying but I think it might be due to my inexperience with first person shooting games since I am generally used to third person cameras. 
The game has a spectacular soundtrack from songs we all know and grew up with to some fantastically composed original pieces. I found the instillment of the tracks with their respective scenes very well-done; it spoke directly to emotions. 
There were some incredible plot twist; some of which I've seen coming and some, I had no idea about. All in all, it's nice to be surprised about a story you've involved yourself with. 
Despite the closedown of Irrational Games, I am hoping the franchise will continue because I certainly would like to experience more of Bioshock.

Had to read the explanation of the ending on the wiki after beating the game.
10/10 would play again.
Entretenido, satisfactorio, asi de simple!
Awesome game.
dat everything tho

Wow! What a game. It's been a long time since I have played a FPS and this just blew me away. Great characters that I actually give a shit about, a story where I actually wantt o progress through the game to learn more. Columbia looks and sounds great, filled with curious details. And you have a saw for a hand that slices pieces faces liek pizza. 10/10

Bioshok Infinite прочно заняла место в списке моих любимых игр.
Шикарная атмосфера, великолепный арт-дирекшен, чудесный OST и конечно же, невероятная история. Чем больше вы будете обращать внимание на детали, чем больше вслушиваться в данные с аудиодневников - тем точнее и красочнее сложится весь пазл картинки. И не забывате про DLC, которые не просто добавляют деталей в картину, но еще и связывают всю трилогию о мире Биошока.
Да, после прохождения у меня остались вопросы, на которые нет ответов, но думаю тут уже дело в сообразительности и интеллекте меня, как игрока)
Концовка Infinite перетряхнет вам душу, а DLC посыпят солью раны.
Единственный минус этой игры - она слишком короткая. 10, может 15 часов, плюс еще парочка с DLC. Хочется больше, факт.
Я обязательно переиграю в Bioshok Infinite, и думаю, не раз.
Чего и вам советую.

По-моему, Bioshock Infinite одна из тех игр, к которой применимо слово искусство. Да, может здесь надоедающий геймплей, замудрённый сюжет(который, по-моему, плохим от этого ни разу не становится), но все эти недостатки ничто, по сравнению с работой, которая проделана. Также нельзя не сказать про DLC - оно просто шикарное и местами превосходит оригинал. Burial At Sea, порой, показывает такие сцены, во время которых понимаешь, что авторы делали действительно то, что они хотели делать, они смогли заставить тебя мыслить, переживать, поверить в происходящее всего лишь средствами компьютерной графики. Испытывать эмоции - это то, почему я люблю игры и я очень рад, что такие игры до сих пор выходят. 
— Я вижу... орла.
— А я — решку.
— Здесь всё дело в плоскости.
— Что ты видишь с этого угла? Жив.
— А с этого? Мёртв.
— Та же монета.
— Но другая плоскость.
— Орёл.
— Решка.
— Мёртв.
— Жив.
— Тут как с велосипедом.
— Ты ведь не разучилась.
— Просто нужна смелость сесть на него.

Прекрасный антураж,зубодробительный геймплей,который просто не даёт заскучать,куча Vigor'ов,интересного и необычного оружия,отлично проработанные уровни,замечательные персонажи,и просто шикарный сюжет-это всё рецепт Bioshock Infinite.

Сам "Инфинит" прекрасен,страна Колумбия-превосходный идеал,небесная обитель.
Окружение просто-напросто завораживает и захватывает дух.
Враги здесь очень даже интересные их и не много и не мало.
Много кто расстраивался из-за того что нет связи с предыдущими частями,но разработчики сделали шикарные DLC,которые возвращают нас в Rapture/Восторг[RU],ну а там всё как надо(Большие папочки,сестрички,подводный город)
Вообщем игра что надо!Обязательна к приобретению,но к приобретению вместе с Season Pass'oм.

I can not believe everybody hated games like Duke Nukem Forever and then hail garbage like this pixel art.
The story is really not fantastic, and if I was Booker from the moment she implied she would be a problem I probably would have just slugged her, up and over the shoulder she goes and game over. Or be prepared and have like a drug or something handy, maybe tie the arms? Listen, I'm not saying I want to play a game as a violent kidnapper I'm just saying it would make a lot more sense for the kidnapper to be prepared to be at least a little rough.

Gameplay is lackluster, no life changing or mind blowing mechanics. Chain lightening all the things.

Grandioso juego. Un ejemplo de como un videojuego puede pasar las fronteras del mero entretenimiento y convertirse en arte. No es un matamata pasillero (aunque el más simple se quedará en esto). Tiene transfondo, narrativa y te hace reflexionar sobre la propia naturaleza del ser humano (Las quimeras dirigidas a establecer el paraiso en la tierra). Es una novela sobre una distopía en toda regla. El diseño gráfico es maravilloso  y transmite sensaciones. Quien haya visto la serie de televisión "Fringe" podrá comprobar que una gran parte de su argumetación bebe de sus planteamientos.

El Bioshock 1 era mejor en todos los aspectos mencionados, pero éste le va a la zaga. 

Lo jugué y me lo pasé extraoficialmente, pero no podia dejar de comprarlo para hacer valer el mérito de sus desarrolladores.

Игра шедевральна. Внешний вид и сюжет - на высоте. Она стоит свих денег. Только нужно Вас предупредить, без русской озвучки и быстрого чтения титров мало что можно будет понят. Развязку особенно. Наслаждайтесь.

Oikein mukava pelikokemus. Tuli välteltyä tätä peliä turhaan! (ostin kun kerran halvalla sai). Jotka tykkää jokapaikan pelissä pyrkiä koluamaan niin tässä tekemistä riittää. Viimeinen tunti vähän jyystämistä medium vaikeustasolla ja loppu kyllä raavituttaa päätä että wtf. Läpäisyyn meni 17 tuntia ja hyvää vastinetta rahalle. Suosittelen.  // pari päivää tästä: Tuli ostettua dlc:t 1+2 ja en voi kuin kehua.  Kaikki portit aukeaa näköjään tyhmällekkin viimeistään 2 dlc:n lopussa. Aivan loistava yksinpelikokemus koko sarja. En suosittele aloittamaan tästä infinitestä vaan käymään alusta asti koko paskan läpi (kuten max payne sarjassa). Harvoin tällaisia helmiä pääsee kokemaan. Ehdotonta parhautta yksinpelien sarjassa.

Многие считают биошок обычным шутером,пробежать пострелять,но это не так.Биошок такая игра в которую  нужно играть ради сюжета.Сюжет действительно на уровне.А насчет гемпелея, однатоные перестрелки разбавлены спасобностями...поэтому лупить вврагов не надоедает.И стоит сыграть даже только ради Элизабет.Возможно это последняя часть биошок "судя по слухам"..всё таки надеюсь в скором будущем будет новая часть.Так же DLC наверно одно из них станет лучшим дополнением года.
Gorgeous Classic BioShock-style visuals and a great great GREAT, well told story, this one should not be missed. You won't regret this buy. Recommended!

The single best singleplayer FPS you will ever play. Elizabeth will enchant you with her manipulative design and placement and you will all forget about the linearity, stupidity of your enemies, low replay value or even the massive holes in the plot. Elizabeth makes it all good!

[h1]Esta 3er entrega viene con una gran historia, ambientacion y jugabilidad;[/h1]

+Ambientacion impecable, desde el minuto 1 se nota que se cuido al maximo cada detalle
+La jugabilidad esta bien implementada y al avanzar contas con varias opciones para elegir en ataque
+Personajes con mucha carisma y una gran historia que no tiene nada que envidiarle a la 1er entrega
+Duracion mas que aceptable y todavia mas si se le suman las expansiones
+Rendimiento casi perfecto y mas teniendo en cuenta la calidad y cantidad de opciones graficas que tuvo en su momento
+Varias dificultades para elegir, desde una que hace el juego un paseo, hasta una que te va a exigir al maximo
+Precio inmejorable por lo que ofrece
+Graficamente tiene una calidad muy buena teniendo en cuenta el momento en que salio

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1984449093
-Una de sus expansiones consiste en completar desafios de oleadas y esta lejos en calidad del juego principal y las otras 2 expansiones
-Al igual que las otras entregas, algunos jefes no estan muy a la altura

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1974369813

With bioshock infinite I just felt more of the storyline being unraveled and presented to you as you complete the game. The setting is pretty amazing too. Highly recemmended.

Bioshock Infinte, now where do I start.
This game is the 3rd in it's series and keeps the legacy from the first two games. Bioshock Infinite has a GREAT story, wonderful gameplay mechanics, AWARD WINNING art style and a great damn trailer song. (Did I mention you can eat a banana from the bin?)

Bioshock Infinite is a story driven fantasy fps (and horror) game and if you have the time, I definitely recommend you play through this game.

10/10
Infinite is great and I certainly recommend it. I enjoyed the combat and the visuals were fantastic. That being said, I felt like the story was not as engaging as the original Bioshock.
Play this game you will love it. You really dont need to play the other games to understand it. And the ending will bust your nuts.

Another great BioShock installment.

I didn't like the new save system at first, but in the end I found that it didn't really cause me any problems and in reality made me focus on the gameplay and stopped me from quick saving every 2 minutes.

The DLC is recommended as it ties up the overall BioShock storyline in a neat little bow!

Beautiful graphics, beautiful story, beautiful gameplay, beautiful music... This game is all-around BEAUTIFUL! And intense. Be prepared.

Spent an unforunate amount of money on this game. I could go on for hours about the disappointments and shortcomings of both Infinite's story and gameplay, but for those looking for a quick review:

Cons: 

-Plot that starts out solid and then becomes overly tangled and changes focus unsatisfyingly
-Combat gameplay that, while not bad on its own, has taken a *huge* step back from the previous installments, and that I would describe as 'fun, but mediocre'.
-Amazing setting and fascinating enemies that the game completely avoids ever explaining or focusing on in any detail. Many characters and enemies have great potential for interest but then fall flat. Never did I think I could be so disinterested in the city of Columbia itself, too.
-Childish and borderline offensive attempts at tackling important issues of race and class
-Every character is modeled very consistently with the environment except for Elizabeth who inexplicably has a gigantic melon head, teeny tiny waist with no room for internal organs, big baby anime eyes, and a wonderfully cozy looking push-up bodice.

Pros:
-The game is gorgeous, indisputably. Almost worth playing just for the visuals alone. Fantastic design and attention to detail was clearly used in creating the city... but that just makes it more disappointing when no one talks about it.
-Voice acting is fantastic, as is the soundtrack.
-Gameplay is pretty solid, if not terribly innovative. Traveling by Sky-hook is certainly invigorating and a fresh take on quick traveling, although not super helpful in combat.
-Elizabeth follows you through a large chunk of the game but doesn't get in the way. In many ways she's a help rather than a hindrance, and I was glad to have her around most of the time.
-The first chunk of the game is incredibly fun, and everything up to and including helping Elizabeth escape her tower (sans the infamous baseball scene) is a blast.

All in all, I don't recommend this game to my friends and tend to be vocal about my dislike for this game and how it was handled, but I also admit I have a lot of biases. I was very excited, for YEARS, for this game, but once I hit a certain point I realized how I wasn't enjoying it as much as I'd hoped... and then the flaws only stood out more and more. In the end, I think anyone buying this looking for a fun shooter in an interesting environment won't be disappointed. It's definitely fun, just not particularly deep or innovative, as much as Irrational and Ken Levine would like you to believe.
